Welcome to NNRG CHATBOT! I'm here to assist you with any questions or information you need about our college. Whether you have inquiries about admissions, courses, campus facilities, or any other topic, feel free to ask. How can I assist you today?

patterns: What courses do our college offer?
Tell me about our available programs
responses: NNRG offers a wide range of courses and programs in various fields such as MBA, Pharmacy, Engineering. To get a comprehensive list of our available courses, please visit our website or specify your area of interest.

patterns: Can you tell me more about B.Tech courses ?
Give me details about B.Tech courses
Tell me about School of B.Tech courses
responses: Computer Science & Engineering, CSE (AI & ML), CSE (Data Science), Information Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Civil Engineering

patterns: How can I apply to your college?
When is the application deadline for the upcoming semester?
Tell me about the admission process
How do I apply for admission?
What are the requirements for admission?
How can I check my application status?
How can I contact the admissions office?
responses: To apply to our college, you can visit our admissions website......

Admission requirements vary by program and level of study. You can find specific admission requirements for each program on our website. Generally, you'll need to submit your academic transcripts, standardized test scores (if required), letters of recommendation, and a personal statement
Admission requirements vary by program. You can find specific requirements on our website.
Application deadlines vary by program and admission type. Please check our website for the deadline that applies to you.
Yes, we welcome international students. You'll need to follow the same application process and may need to provide proof of English language proficiency and visa documentation.
You can check your application status by logging into your applicant portal on our website.
Tuition fees can change annually. Please refer to the 'Tuition and Fees' section on our website for the latest information.
We offer a wide range of majors and programs. Explore the list on our website for detailed information.
You can contact the admissions office by phone at [phone number] or by email at [email address]. We're here to help!

patterns: How can I schedule a campus tour?
Tell me about virtual information sessions
responses: You can schedule a campus tour or virtual information session by visiting our website and navigating to the 'Visit Us' or 'Events' section. There, you'll find options to register for tours and events.

NNRG was established in the year 2009, affiliated to JNTU – Hyderabad, Approved by AICTE – New Delhi and PCI - New Delhi. Institution established with sole objective of providing world class technical education. From the time of its initiation, the Integrated Campus including School of Engineering, School of Pharmacy and School of Management Sciences has been striving to scale the heights of excellence through the consistent efforts of the management headed by Sri Nalla Narasimha Reddy, Secretary and the dedicated and committed faculty. By the introduction of innovative curriculum insistence on academic discipline and imparting of holistic education.
